text: a l laoh ban bangkeut kak hpeah chea pei tol ha r m del chea kanleng chuobchoum samreab mnoussa lok . haey( trong hamkhat min aoy thveusangkream) now banda khe ha rm ning( min aoy bampean towleu) a l ha t yea ning satv delke ban peak bralaw k . teangnoh ku daembi aoy puok anakdoeng tha pitabrakd nasa a l laoh doeng nouv avei del mean now leumekh cheachraen chean ning avei del mean now leu phendei . haey pitabrakd nasa a l laoh doeng bamphot nouv real avei teangoasa
